title: Whats that song? I dont know any words or who sings it but the video depicts an unhappy family around a table and the drama escalates as it goes on. In the background of the video there is a face being taken off and sewn on again? - Quora

response.answer_text: Twisted Sister - We're Not Gonna Take it I think this is the closest that i can remember based on that description.There’s no faces being removed, but the rest fits.
Everything Dies by Type O Negative from the World Coming Down album? There is no drama though.
